price: Monfa mo ho ma no korakora wͻ adwen sakra mu, na monsuro no, na monfrε Nyame wͻ ne berε mu, na monhwε na moankͻka wͻn a wͻyɛ (Nyame ho) matahoo no ho,
arabic: ۞ مُنِيبِينَ إِلَيۡهِ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَلَا تَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: munībīna ilayhi wa-ittaqūhu wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata walā takūnū mina al-mush'rikīna
